page.title: 18PLAYTIME GAMES 1
page.content:
While we are at school we have playtimes.We go outside onto the playground and play games.If one of the games needs someone to be on we choose them using one of these rhymes INKY PINKY PONKY DADDY BOUGHT A DONKEY DONKEY DIED,DADDY CRIED INKY PINKY PONKY
MICKEY MOUSE BUILT A HOUSE HOW MANY BRICKS DID HE USE? 5 1,2,3,4,5 O-U-T SPELLS OUT GOES HE You point to the children and say the rhyme. Some of the games we play are School-Rally Scarecrow,Rally 123,Off ground Tig,Red Rover,Sinking Sands,TV Programmes,Tom Tom come to school and Star Tig.
